creator: N/A
headline: N/A
abstract:
The EcogenO platform, specialised in environmental genomics, offers original thinking and promotes the transfer of knowledge and expertise in the field.

This platform enables projects for large-scale amplicon production and their analysis by sequencing, as well as RNASeq, ChipSeq or DNASeq projects.

Equipped with 2nd generation NGS sequencers (Illumina) and a large number of satellite equipment required for sample preparation, the EcogenO platform offers the implementation and support of sequencing projects, from library preparation to primary bioinformatics data analysis.

In addition, the presence on the EcogenO platform of very high throughput quantitative PCR and genotyping equipment, unique in France (Smartchip system, Takara), offers the scientific community a capacity for project management for functional analyses (qPCR and RT-qPCR, dPCR) and SNP genotyping.

EcogenO has a large storage and analysis capacity for SNP data, enabling the development of bioinformatics analyses, specific to a project or an application in a collaborative mode.
The scientific community can apply for an access to some of this equipment, after training and accreditation by the staff.

distributionInfo: Commission Regulation (EU) No 1089/2010 of 23 November 2010 implementing Directive 2007/2/EC of the European Parliament and of the Council as regards interoperability of spatial data sets and services
